company.name: AutoStream
company.description: A SaaS product that provides automated video editing tools for content creators

policies.support: 24/7 support available only on Pro plan

faqs.question: What platforms do you support?
faqs.answer: AutoStream supports YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and other major platforms.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade my plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can upgrade from Basic to Pro anytime.
